Container.Name: tandarr
Container.Overview: Tandarr is a LAN movie night picker. Swipe through your Plex library Tinder-style with friends to find movies everyone wants to watch. Connect to your Plex server, create a room, set filters, and start swiping. When everyone swipes right on the same movie, it's a match!
Container.Requires: A configured Plex Media Server accessible on your network.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for the Tandarr web interface

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Persistent storage for configuration and library cache

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: Plex server URL (e.g., http://192.168.1.50:32400). Optional — can also configure via web UI.

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: Plex authentication token. Optional — can also configure via web UI.
